item.description:
In 2012 we bring you a more exciting Bigger and Better Version of Desi Fridays with more music more masti more Dhamaal.

Wana be my Chamak Challo/ Channo/ Chikni Chameli / Kolaverdi and many more live and continue to take over our heart.. This week we promise to have Bollywood and Bhangra run through and take over your mind.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We have been sold out every Friday by Midnight. Come early. 2012: This year we bring you more exciting Dj's at Downtown Bostons all Desi Party on Friday will several new additions to our Line up. This week we present Dj Hitzz Takeover !!

But first this Friday. Mark the Date March 9th.. Caprice Boston - 275 Tremont Street, Boston MA (Upstairs)

This week Dj Hitzz Rocking the House.

$10 Cover on the Guestlist. Ladies free before 11:00 PM with RSVP by emailing: Generationdesi@gmail.com
item.name: Dj Hitzz Take over @ Caprice / Desi Fridays (Bhangra vs Bollywood)
